title: Nearly $50,000,000 To Be Handed Out to Victims of Curve Finance Exploit After Vote
description:
Decentralized finance (DeFi) protocol Curve Finance (CRV) says it will compensate users who sustained losses as a result of a massive security breach earlier this year. In late July, a vulnerability with the programming language Vyper 0.2.15 enabled hackers to exploit several liquidity pools on the platform, leading to losses of around $70 million. The […]

The post Nearly $50,000,000 To Be Handed Out to Victims of Curve Finance Exploit After Vote appeared first on The Daily Hodl.
